segments.text: I see the woman is still drying that plate, completely unaware of the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how focused she is on that one task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really struggling to reach the cookies, but he's determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit annoyed that he's making such an effort for just a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting so patiently, her eyes fixed on the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's thinking about how good the cookies will taste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is really making a mess on the floor now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how much is pouring out of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so close to the edge of the stool, it's making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and make an even bigger mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so well-kept and peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a nice view, but no one inside seems to notice it.
segments.speaker: PAR
